author: vishnudt2004
message: fix(curriculum): update step 12 and 13 in fcc authors page workshop (#60916)

files.patch:
@@ -7,7 +7,9 @@ dashedName: step-12
 
 # --description--
 
-Now create an image tag and give it a `class` attribute of `"user-img"`. Use string interpolation to set the `src` attribute to the `image` you destructured earlier. Set the `alt` attribute to `author` followed by the text `"avatar"`. Make sure there is a space between the `author` variable and the word `"avatar"`, for example, `"Quincy Larson avatar"`.
+Inside the `displayAuthors` function, the data of each author has been destructured for you.
+
+Now create an image tag and give it a `class` attribute of `"user-img"`. Use string interpolation to set the `src` attribute to the `image` property. Set the `alt` attribute to `author` followed by the text `"avatar"`. Make sure there is a space between the `author` variable and the word `"avatar"`, for example, `"Quincy Larson avatar"`.
 
 # --before-all--

@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ dashedName: step-13
 
 # --description--
 
-The next thing you'll show are biographical details about the author. You can do this with `bio` that you destructured earlier.
+The next thing you'll show are biographical details about the author. You can do this by using the `bio` property.
 
 Add a paragraph element with a `class` attribute of `"bio"`, then interpolate `bio` inside the paragraph element.
